articles.content: Ronnie OSullivan has sent a warning to Mark Allen following the 36-year-olds UK Championship victory. The Rocket watched on as his rivals sparkling form continued to win his maiden title at the event… [+2761 chars]

articles.title: Female TV reporter Dominique Metzger is robbed live on air at Qatar World Cup - Daily Mail
articles.description: Argentinian reporter Dominique Metzger was broadcasting from the Corniche area of Doha in the build up to the first match when she says items from her handbag were stolen.
articles.content:
A female Argentinian television reporter was robbed live on air while reporting in Qatar on the World Cup, with money and documents stolen from her handbag.
